mapper.select: SELECT "doctor_id" AS "doctorId", "payment_status" AS "paymentStatus" FROM HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE WHERE "id" = ${id}

SELECT vd."id" AS "diagnoseId", pc."name" AS "name", pc."tel" AS "tel", pu."photo" AS "photo", TO_CHAR(vd."expect_start", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "expectStart", TO_CHAR(vd."expect_end", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "expectEnd", vd."status" AS "status" FROM HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE vd JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD pc ON vd."patient_card_id" = pc."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER pu ON pc."user_id" = pu."id" WHERE vd."id" = ${diagnoseId}
